about.details:
Sunlite Recycling Industries Limited was established in 2012 and manufactures copper rods and wires, copper earthing wires, copper earthing strips, copper conductors, copper wire rods etc. by recycling copper scrap for power generation, transmission, distribution and electronics industries.

The company's product portfolio offers a diversified product range that includes a variety of grades, thicknesses, widths and standards in all types of copper products according to customer specifications.

Sunlite Recycling Industries currently has a registered office and manufacturing facility in Kheda, Gujarat, with a total area of approximately 12,152 square metres and over 20 machines for manufacturing a wide range of copper products.

The company recorded a total revenue from operations of Rs. 85,168.31 lacs and employed 38 people as on March 31, 2024.

faqs.question: What is the Sunlite Recycling Industries IPO?
faqs.answer:
Sunlite Recycling Industries IPO is a SME IPO of 2880000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹30.24 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹105 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1200.

The IPO opens on August 12, 2024, and closes on August 14, 2024.

Cameo Corporate Services Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Sunlite Recycling Industries IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Sunlite Recycling Industries IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Sunlite Recycling Industries IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Sunlite Recycling Industries IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Sunlite Recycling Industries IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Sunlite Recycling Industries IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Sunlite Recycling Industries IPO opens on August 12, 2024 and closes on August 14, 2024.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Sunlite Recycling Industries IPO?
faqs.answer: Sunlite Recycling Industries IPO lot size is 1200, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,26,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Sunlite Recycling Industries IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Sunlite Recycling Industries IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Sunlite Recycling Industries IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Sunlite Recycling Industries IPO will be done on Friday, August 16, 2024, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Monday, August 19, 2024. Check the Sunlite Recycling Industries IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Sunlite Recycling Industries IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Sunlite Recycling Industries IPO listing date is on Tuesday, August 20, 2024.
